text:
HomeBuilder Grants Regulations 2020

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the HomeBuilder Grants Act 2020 .

7 December 2020

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Finance

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the HomeBuilder Grants Regulations 2020 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations are taken to have taken effect on 4 June 2020.

3. Interpretation
    In these regulations â€“
        Act means the HomeBuilder Grants Act 2020 ;
        Homes Tasmania means Homes Tasmania established by section 9(1) of the Homes Tasmania Act 2022 .

4. Exclusion from application of section 21 of Act
    If the Commissioner recognises a non-conforming interest as a relevant interest in land under section 7(4) of the Act, the holder of a relevant interest in the land (other than the holder of the non-conforming interest) is excluded from the application of section 21 of the Act.

5. Exclusion of Homes Tasmania from application of section 21 of Act
    Homes Tasmania is excluded from the application of section 21 of the Act.

6. Protection of confidential information
    For section 52(4)(e) of the Act, protected information may be disclosed to a State Service officer or State Service employee employed in the Department if the information is not likely to identify a particular applicant for a Tasmanian HomeBuilder grant or a Commonwealth HomeBuilder grant.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 10 December 2020

These regulations are administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
